creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: three full lines and a fourth short line of very neatly, clearly written, evenly spaced characters; red intaglio seal URC; two red seals (top intaglio; bottom relief) LLC; mounted onto thick paperboard with gold leaf flecks on border
markings: URC, red rectangular intaglio; LLC, square red intaglio; LLC, square red relief stamp; on back, LRQ, in pencil, various markings
signed: L center: [ 柳湾老人 ] {Ryūwan rōjin}
title: Poem in Regular-Running Script
